title: Enhancing the exploitation of natural resources for green energy: An application of LSTM-based meta-model for aluminum prices forecasting
content:
Publication date: May 2024

Source: Resources Policy, Volume 92

Author(s): Moses Olabhele Esangbedo, Blessing Olamide Taiwo, Hawraa H. Abbas, Shahab Hosseini, Mohammed Sazid, Yewuhalashet Fissha
